Action Context: A man in a black suit stands in a dimly lit room with checkered flooring
his arms outstretched as if he is about to perform an action. The scene quickly shifts to a woman in a blue dress standing in front of a large
circular platform. She is holding a microphone and appears to be speaking or singing into it. The camera then cuts to a close-up of a man in a black shirt with white studs on his shoulders
who is performing a martial arts move

his body twisted in mid-air. Decompose into 2-5 essential stages Each stage should be the people do sth.
